subject: History
studyNotes: Ancient Egypt: The Nile River provided fertile soil and transportation routes.
Ancient India: Civilisations like Harappa and Mohenjo-Daro developed along the Indus River.
Historical Concepts: Continuity & Change, Cause & Effect, Perspectives, Empathy, Significance, Contestability.
